mapper.select: /* SQL ID : com.monstermarine.api.notice.getNotice 설명 : 공지사항 조회 */ SELECT NOTICE_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENTS, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, IS_VIEW, IS_DELETE FROM MONSTER_MARINE.NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}

/* SQL ID : com.monstermarine.api.notice.getNoticeList 설명 : 공지사항 목록 */ SELECT NOTICE_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENTS, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, IS_VIEW, IS_DELETE FROM MONSTER_MARINE.NOTICE WHERE IS_DELETE = false
mapper.insert: /* SQL ID : com.monstermarine.api.notice.insertNotice 설명 : 공지사항 등록 */ INSERT INTO MONSTER_MARINE.NOTICE ( TITLE, CONTENTS, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, IS_VIEW ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, now(), now(), #{userId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{isView} )
mapper.update:
/* SQL ID : com.monstermarine.api.notice.updateNotice 설명 : 공지사항 수정 */
UPDATE MONSTER_MARINE.NOTICE SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, UPDATE_DATE = now(), USER_ID = #{userId}, START_DATE = #{startDate}, END_DATE = #{endDate}, IS_VIEW = #{isView} WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}
/* SQL ID : com.monstermarine.api.notice.deleteNotice 설명 : 공지사항 삭제 */ UPDATE MONSTER_MARINE.NOTICE SET IS_DELETE = '1' WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}
